trans-unit.source: Represents a single item of data extracted from a workflow and all its associated annotations.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un singolo elemento di dati estratti da un flusso di lavoro e tutte le annotazioni associate.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When the runtime tracking infrastructure matches a track point, it sends a tracking record to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando l'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime corrisponde a un track point, invia un record di rilevamento al servizio di rilevamento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> may contain <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects that specify data to be extracted from the workflow and returned in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> or the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>o un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint>può contenere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>degli oggetti che specificano i dati da estrarre dal flusso di lavoro e restituiti in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint>

trans-unit.source: A TrackingDataItem represents a single item of this extracted data in either <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Un TrackingDataItem rappresenta un singolo elemento di dati estratti in uno <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the list of annotations associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta l'elenco di annotazioni associate ai dati estratti.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> can specify annotations to be sent with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>può specificare annotazioni da inviare con i dati estratti.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: These are contained in the Annotations property.
A <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"></xref> that contains the annotations associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection"> </xref> che contiene le annotazioni associate ai dati estratti.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the extracted data associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta i dati estratti associati con la <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Data contains the member data, specified by an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> or a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>, that was extracted from the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Dati contengono i dati del membro, specificati da un <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract>, che è stato estratto dall'istanza del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the extracted data.
Gets or sets the name of the property or field associated with the extracted data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome della proprietà o del campo associato ai dati estratti.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure supports data extraction on fields and properties of classes that inherit from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>; a member of such a field or property; and a single item of a field or a property (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, for example a single element in a collection.
trans-unit.target: L'infrastruttura di rilevamento di runtime supporta l'estrazione dei dati su campi e proprietà delle classi che ereditano da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>, un membro di tale campo o proprietà e un singolo elemento di un campo o una proprietà (o un membro di entrambi) che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>interfaccia, ad esempio un singolo elemento in una raccolta.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: FieldName contains the dot delineated name of the item extracted and is equivalent to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> or <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> depending on which type of extract specified the data contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>.
trans-unit.target: FieldName contiene il nome delimitato da punti punto dell'elemento estratto ed è equivalente a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A>o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A>a seconda del tipo di estrazione specificato i dati contenuti da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the property or field that was extracted.
trans-unit.target: Nome della proprietà o campo che è stato estratto delimitato.
